title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Grasslands]
description: A wooden shield lies rotting in the dirt.  It is half buried in the ground, grown over with grass and weeds.  Its exposed surface is bleached bone-white in the moonlight and is deeply cracked, a testament to the time it has spent forgotten in this place.

A wooden shield lies rotting in the dirt.  It is half buried in the ground, grown over with grass and weeds.  Its exposed surface is bleached and cracked, a testament to the time it has spent forgotten in this place.
